Text: Thérèse Raquin (1928 film):  The film stars Gina Manès as Thérèse Raquin, Wolfgang Zilzer as Monsieur Raquin, and Jeanne Marie Laurent as Madame Raquin.

Text: Thérèse Raquin (1928 film):  The film was produced by Deutsche Film Union in Germany, with German and French actors, in a French-German co-production, to be later released at the same time in France as "Thérèse Raquin" and Germany as Du sollst nicht ehebrechen!
